title: Prime Checker
code:
§begin check_prime
  n ← 17
  is_prime ← §true
  divisor ← 2
  §iterate check §in [1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8]
    §if divisor ⊘ n
      test ← divisor ⊕ divisor
      §if n ≈ test
        is_prime ← §false
      §end_if
      divisor ← divisor ⊕ 1
    §end_if
  §end_iterate
  §if is_prime
    §transmit "prime"
  §else
    §transmit "composite"
  §end_if
§end
solution_description: checks if a number is prime by testing divisibility
hints: Tests if n can be divided by any number from 2 upward
17 cannot be evenly divided by 2, 4, 6, 8, etc.
This implements a basic primality test
